posts.post_text: January 18, 2021 at 12:47 PM#2this is discussed all over the place in this forum.the syntax to take selection of an effect with a currently selected group isstore effect 1.effect.line /oif you want to be asked beforehand you can use variables like $selectionfx and then usesetvar $selectionfx = "(which effect #?)"store effect 1.$selectionfx.line /o
